args.desc: There are critters disrupting the fields. Clear them out.

args.prompt: You venture to the fields. The wheat is as tall as you, however, the roots are eaten away and destroyed.
You notice a large amount of rat droppings in a peculiar spot. You walk towards it, following the tracks left by mice.
You return to the mayor's office and are rewarded for a job well done. You've received 100g

args.desc: Villagers have been disappearing on the eastern road outside of town. Find out why.

args.prompt: You venture to the road outside of town. The trees tower over you, casting a quaint shadows across the roads.
As you continue down the road, you notice strange markings on the trees.
You continue down the road, and find a strange portal. Its bluish, purplish glow is unsettling.
You begin heading back towards the town.
You return to the mayor's office and are rewarded for a job well done. You've recieved 100g.

args.desc: A large group of highwayman has been spotted on the outskirts of town. Lower their numbers.

args.prompt: You venture to the outskirts of town. The road is clear, as well as the surrounding area.
You step on something squishy. It's red and leads deeper into the forest.
"FREEZE!" You are surrounded.
You order your group to retreat, as there are too many highwayman.
As you retreat, you hear the terror filled cries of the salesman.
You return to the town. The highwaymen disperse and you go to the mayor's office. You're rewarded with 200g

args.desc: Another group of highwaymen has been spotted on the main road leading into town. Lower their numbers.

args.prompt: You venture to the main road leading into town. Waiting, you detect the highwaymen, they ready their weapons.
You drive them back a bit, and allow the soldiers to take charge. Your army rests.
The battle is over for now. You return to the barracks and are given your pay of 200g

args.desc: An army of highwayman are outside the city gates. The peasants have rallied to defend the city.

args.prompt: You drive what little highwaymen are left, The village lay in ruins. You receive 400gp for your efforts.

args.desc: You venture to Bromide to gather aide to rebuild the The swamps are not very pleasant.

args.prompt: And thus to Bromide you go! You notice a salesman as soon as you leave the town.
As you trek through the swamps, you notice strange tracks.
You pause to rest for the night.
You reach the end of the swamp. You find a rickety old chest, opening it, you find some cool items!

args.desc: You are out of the swamp and on the plains. Bromide can be seen, shining in the distance.

args.prompt: The land gets drier as you enter the plains. Trees become less frequent you see the tips of buildings in the horizon.
You come across a mysterious box.
You take note of the wonderful scenery around you.
The town doesn't seem to be getting closer, but you proceed onward!
You decide to rest here for the time being. The plains is vast, best not to do it all at once.

args.desc: You can see the buildings of Bromide much clearer now, however, there is still a long way to go.

args.prompt: You come across a lake, and decide to replenish yourself.
You find a dirty book on the ground. Opening it, shows the description of an old skill.
The town seems getting much closer, you're almost there!
You reach the town, but something is wrong. It is desolate and blood line the streets.

args.desc: You reach Bromide, but the town is destroyed. Perhaps there are survivors?

args.prompt: As you progress through the town, you notice that the bodies are missing; there's just blood.
You pass destoryed market stalls and empty pubs. There is loud clanging coming from deeper into town.
You come across a bag filled with health potions.
You follow the noise to a church. There are people fighting outside of it.

args.desc: You search the town, looking for survivors. You notice a small glow deeper into town.

args.prompt: You fight your way deeper into town.
The battle is not yet over. However, you take a breather to regain your strenghth.

args.desc: You get closer to the small glow. It's an old church with soldiers fighting outside of it.

args.prompt: As you approach a group of Orc stand in your way.
The Orc are destoryed; you reached the survivors!

args.desc: You seek to push through the Orc to the small light.

args.prompt: You step into a residential part of town. Blood is everywhere and Orc can be heard closeby.
You push through! However, the fight is now over!

args.desc: Alas, Thormund cave. It is time to vanquish the demon and return peace to the realm.

args.prompt: You venture into the cave. As soon as you do a strange force prevents you from leaving. There is only one way out. You begin making your way thruogh the caves.
You proceed further into the cave.

args.desc: You journey though the cave, you vanquish the demon once and for all.

args.prompt: You journey further into the cave.

args.desc: You journey though the cave, you vanquish the demon once and for all.

args.prompt: You venture further into the cave.

args.desc: You journey though the cave, you vanquish the demon once and for all.

args.prompt: You here a battle cry from deep inside the cave.
You venture deeper into the cave.

args.desc: You journey though the cave, you vanquish the demon once and for all.

args.prompt: You venture deeper into the caves.

args.desc: You journey though the cave, you vanquish the demon once and for all.

args.prompt: "ENOUGH!"
A voice rumbles through the cave.
"You impede my conquest, you undermine my reign, and you come into my home." it says.
"YOU WILL BE DEALT WITH!" it shouts.
Your men let out a victory cry. The demon is defeated!

args.desc: Farmers have reported critters in their fields, eating their crops.

args.prompt: You set off for the fields, promising to return to the farmhouse when the task is complete.
Returning to the farmhouse, you receive your reward.
Returning to the farmhouse, you receive your reward.

args.desc: Odd spirits have been spotted in an old part of the basement of the library. Clear it out.

args.prompt: You set off for the library.
The great library of Wickerman is a pretty thing. Books line the walls. As you descend deeper, a chill fills your spine.
You clear the basement of the vile creatures, returning to the head librarian for your payment.

args.desc: A dangerous man has been found near the city, commanding the deadby the northern gate. Kill him.

args.prompt: You venture to the northern gate, your men at your back.
You find a chest at the bandit's camp. In it lies a few potions and a wonderous looking sword.
You return to the mayor to receive your reward.

args.desc: A pack of rabid dogs have been found. Thus far they have slaughtered a small child. Take care of them before they hurt anyone else.

args.prompt: You venture to the spot where the dogs lay.
You slaughter the remining dogs and return to the mayor to receive your reward.

args.desc: Evil spirits and their disciples have been found within the town. Destroy them.

args.prompt: You comb through as much of the field before sundown.
You banish your demons; however, your job is far from done.

args.desc: Evil spirits and their disciples have been found within the town.

args.prompt: You venture towards the disturbance.
You banish your demons; however, your job is far from done.

args.desc: Evil spirits and their disciples have been found within the town. Destroy them.

args.prompt: You venture towards the disturbance.
You find a soldier tied to what appears to be a makeshift alter; to what, you do not know.
You free the soldier. She thanks you, saying, "I am in your debt." Alison joins your army!

args.desc: Evil spirits and their disciples have been found within the town. Destroy them.

args.prompt: You venture towards the disturbance.
You banish your demons; however, your job is far from done.

args.desc: Evil spirits and their disciples have been found within the town. Destroy them.

args.prompt: You venture towards the disturbance.
ou banish your demons; however, your job is far from done.

args.desc: Evil spirits and their disciples have been found within the town. Destroy them.

args.prompt: You venture towards the disturbance.
You find a soldier  being held in a cage. He is surrounded.
You vanquish the demons and rescue the soldier. He joins your army.

args.desc: Evil spirits and their disciples have been found within the town. Destroy them.

args.prompt: You venture towards the disturbance.
You banish your demons; however, your job is far from done.

args.desc: A shop where you can buy goods.

args.prompt: You leave the shop.

args.desc: Someone is selling things -- well, whatever they have left.

args.prompt: Thank you come again!

args.desc: You find a challenge nailed on a tree. Complete it and earn a great reward.

args.prompt: The challenge is about to commence.
